name: parseImageData
setDistanceglobal
func:
global.set("distance",msg.payload)
return msg

name: initializeUserIdentification
func:
global.set("userIdentified",false)
global.set("userIdnProcess",false)
global.set("recording",false)
global.set("motionDetected","No")
msg.payload = global.get("userIdentified")
msg.topic = global.get("userIdnProcess")
return msg

name: startUserIdenitifcation
processAzureResponse
func:
var prediction = msg.payload.predictions[0]
global.set("userIdnProcess",false)
if (prediction.tagName == "user"){
    global.set("userIdentified",true)
    msg.text = "Welcome home!"
    return msg
}

name: resetUsrIdnTimer
func: global.set("userIdentified",false)

name: computeAdjustmentDirection
setOptimumLightIntensity
func: global.set("optimalLightIntensityValue",msg.payload)

name: setLightIntensity
func:
global.set("lightIntensityValue",msg.payload)
return msg;

name: automaticBrightnessAdjustment
setBrightness
func:
global.set("brightness",msg.payload.brightness)
global.set("lightStatus",msg.payload.relay_state)

name: setStatus
setBrigthnessGauge
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.brightness
return msg

name: toggleLights
checkUserIdentification
parseHumidity
parseStatus
controlHumidifier
checkHumidity

func:
msg.payload = true
return msg

name: parseTemperature
parseStatus
controlHumidifier
checkTemperature
parseValue
parseAirQuality
func:
payload = {}
payload = msg.payload
global.set("airQualityValue",payload)
msg.payload = payload
return msg

name: parseStatus
controlAirPurifier
checkAirQuality
prepareToken
setHeaders
extractText
processPayloadForHumidifier
processPayloadForPurifier
processPayloadForFan
addTemperatureTextForTTS
addHumidityTextForTTS
addLightTextForTTS
humidiferStatus
func:
msg.payload = "On"
return msg;

name: kasaBrightness
func:
msg.payload = "50%"
return msg;

name: KasaBrightness
func:
msg.payload = "100%"
return msg;

name: humidifierStatus
func:
msg.payload = "Off"
return msg;

name: parseButton
processPayloadForKasaDimmer
prepareTokenTTS
setHeadersTTS
addIntensityTextForTTS
increaseIntensityTTS
decreaseIntensityTTS
recordingProcessComplete
func: global.set("recording",false)

name: toggleMotionDetected
toggleMotionDetected
func:
global.set("motionDetected","No")
return msg;
